str_comp_spoints("_str3",".a",".b*").
str_comp_spoints("_str4",".pp","p4").
str_comp_spoints("_str5",".ap","p5*").
str_comp_spoints("_str6",".ap","p6*").
str_comp_spoints("_str7",".ap","p7").
str_comp_spoints("_str7",".bp","p7").
str_comp_spoints("_str",".a",".b*").
str_glob_spoints("g","g","h").
str_glob_spoints("p7a","p7a","p7").
str_glob_spoints("p7b","p7b","p7").
str_glob_spoints("p","p","q*").
str_spoints("pqargs",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs3",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs4",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs5",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs6",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("twoargs7",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("upcast1",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0*.cs").
str_spoints("upcast2",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0*.cs.s").
str_spoints("updowncast",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0*").
str_spoints("useglob6",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","p6*").
str_spoints("useptr6",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0*","__arg1*").
str_spoints("usestr6",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","p6*").
